isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS AND BUMPER - 7000 - adjustments - Hood

svcsubproc.title: HOOD ADJUSTMENT AND ALIGNMENT
svcsubproc.para: The 7000 series front hood adjustment is done by moving the hinge plate attachment located at the front crossmember.

figure.caption: Figure 50. Forward and Back Hood Adjustment

step1.para: To adjust the hood left to right.

step2.para: Loosen the hinge attachment bolts and slide the hinge plate assemble left or right.
Check the alignment with the hood contour lines. If the hood alignment is proper, tighten the hinge plate bolts. Torque to required value.

step1.para: To adjust hood forward and back, loosen the hinge mounting bolts ( Figure 14, Item 3) at the mounting plate on the front crossmember.

step2.para: Slide the hood forward or aft as required.
Check the distance between the rear edge of hood and clearance to windshield.
Tighten the hinge mounting bolts and torque to required values.

svcsubproc.title: HOOD STOP ADJUSTMENT
svcsubproc.para: Hood height adjustment at the cowl and rear edge of the hood is adjusted by moving the hood stop either up or down.

calloutgroup.callout1: 4. FOUR (4) EACH MOUNTING BOLTS AND WASHERS

svcsubproc.para: Adjusting the hood stops on each side of the vehicles allows for a cleaner fit and seal between the hood and cowl tray. Refer to Figure 51.

step1.para: Tilt hood forward and loosen the four mounting bolts to adjust the hood stop height.

With the hood stop bolts loosened slide the bracket up or down for desired adjustment. Tighten bolts, close hood and check alignment. If alignment is correct, open hood and torque mounting bolts to prescribed torque values. If hood is not at desired position, loosen hood stop and adjust.
